subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Kshatriya Rajput clan originated from the city of Dhundhar?
question_hi: डंडहर से किस कश्तीरों मुख्य क्षेत्रवर्ज़ीय लोगों का संतुलन क्या था?
explanation_en:
The Chahamana clan, also known as the Anhilwadis, was an important historical Rajput clan from Rajasthan. They are famously known for their role in the establishment of the Mewar kingdom.
